title: website: missing FreeBSD 1.4.2 binary release
body:
As stated by Andrew in the [1.4.2 announce post](https://groups.google.com/forum/#!topic/golang-announce/JT1jOsxZ2Ow), the binary release should be available a few days after the 1.4.2 release.
Did we just forget to include it at a later time or are there any issues blocking the binary release?
